pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a first-person perspective shot moving down a long, narrow hallway with a sterile, liminal aesthetic. The walls, floor, and ceiling are all covered in white tiles, illuminated by bright, rectangular lights. To the left of the walkway is a channel of dark water separated by a metal railing, and at the far end of the hall, a large yellow rubber duck is visible.
